low.question: Which animal is commonly considered bad luck in Western superstition if it crosses your path?

Which bird is often linked to omens and death in European folklore?

options: Throwing a coin into a fountain
Tossing a coin at a tree
low.answer: Throwing a coin into a fountain

low.question: Which figurine commonly sits with palms up to ward off the evil eye in some cultures?
